nodes.text: The Battle Droid C-13 was a model of battle droid that saw use during the Cold War. Earlier versions included the Battle Droid C-10 and Battle Droid C-11. Equipped with a blaster rifle, a number of them were deployed to protect the satellite control tower on the Markaran Plains of the planet Balmorra.

Battle Droid C-13s appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Markaran Plains as part of the mission "Calling All Droids" in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
